oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Abernathy, Ora, 1925 April 14
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of Ora Abernathy, dated March 29th, 1923. Illustrates the first page of the document. Abernathy’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on April 14, 1925. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Abernathy family
